sections.title: Error #10000004
sections.text: Ensure no AV/EDR is running and your system isn’t infected by a rootkit.

sections.title: Error #3B000000
sections.text: Disable Core Isolation and Memory Integrity in Windows Defender. Run `bcdedit /set hypervisorlaunchtype off` in admin CMD, restart PC, or disable Intel VT-X/AMD SVM in BIOS. Ensure Vanguard/Faceit/ESEA are uninstalled.

sections.title: Error #37100022
sections.text: Hold SHIFT and restart your PC.

sections.title: Error #3C000101
sections.text: Windows build number too low—minimum supported is 19041.

sections.title: Error #3C000110
sections.text: Multiple launcher instances detected—close all but one.
